article.title: December 2013 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The December 2013 Galaxy Update is out:

Highlights:

  • Three new public Galaxy servers, bringing the total to over 50.
  • 61 new papers (a new monthly record)
  • Who's hiring at seven different institutions

  • Upcoming Events, including

    • Save these dates! GCC2014: June 30 - July 2, Baltimore

      • Sponsorships and Exhibitors
    • UC Davis Bioinformatics Boot Camps
  • Distributions
  • Tool Shed contributions (including a new ToolShed)
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the next Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
